function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of definitive epidemiologic data demonstrating the prevention of HAIs in healthcare facilities by UVGI systems.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) in healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Conducting further studies to gather epidemiologic data demonstrating the effectiveness of UVGI systems in preventing HAIs in healthcare facilities.","Technologies":"UVGI systems, data collection and analysis tools.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors in healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare facility administrators, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of objective, reproducible evidence of improved energy efficiency of coils and fans with UVGI systems installed in AHUs.","Impact":"Ineffective use of UVGI systems in improving energy efficiency of coils and fans in AHUs.","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to objectively measure and demonstrate the energy efficiency improvements of coils and fans with UVGI systems installed in AHUs.","Technologies":"Energy efficiency measurement tools, data collection and analysis tools.","People":"HVAC technicians, building managers, energy efficiency consultants.","Owner":"Research institutions, HVAC equipment manufacturers, energy efficiency organizations."},{"Description":"Unsubstantiated marketing claims suggesting that UVGI systems will protect against emerging diseases such as SARS CoV, influenza, M tuberculosis, and bioterrorism agents.","Impact":"False sense of security and potential misallocation of resources based on unsubstantiated marketing claims.","Mitigation":"Conducting rigorous studies to assess the effectiveness of UVGI systems in protecting against specific diseases, and regulating marketing claims to ensure accuracy and evidence-based advertising.","Technologies":"Laboratory testing equipment, data collection and analysis tools, regulatory monitoring and enforcement tools.","People":"General public, healthcare facility administrators, government health agencies.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government health agencies, regulatory bodies."}]}
